tuv.seg: An EU funding programme for activities in the areas of education, training, youth and sport
Clár maoiniúcháin de chuid an AE le haghaidh gníomhaíochtaí sna réimsí um oideachas, oiliúint, an óige agus spórt
Europass is a suite of an official documents that help people make their skills, qualifications and work related training clearly and easily understood throughout Europe
Déantar cur síos sa doiciméad seo ar Europass
Find out about the Leonardo da Vinci programme, the European Community's vocational training programme
Faigh amach faoin gclár Leonardo da Vinci, clár gairmoiliúna an Aontais Eorpaigh
This document describes Grundtvig, a European education programme that aims to improve adult education in Europe
Déanann an cháipéis seo cur síos ar Grundtvig, clár oideachais Eorpaigh a bhfuil sé mar aidhm aige feabhas a chur ar oideachas aosach san Eoraip
Comenius, a European Commission-funded education programme, deals with pre-school, primary and post-primary education
Comenius, clár oideachais maoinithe ag an gCoimsiún Eorpach,a dhéileálann le réamhscolaíocht, le bunoideachas agus le hiar-bhunoideachas
Ábhar is mó éilimh i "Oideachas agus Oiliúint"
School terms in primary and post-primary schools
Téarmaí scoile i mbunscoileanna agus iarbhunscoileanna
